p: F. nodosa essential oil α-amylase, α-glucosidase, and lipase inhibitory activities were concentration-dependent, and results are summarized in Table 3. The essential oil exhibited promising lipase enzyme inhibitory activity, with an IC 50 value of 42.0 μg/mL. This value was 0.8 times higher than that found for the positive control, orlistat. A lower enzyme inhibitory activity was found against α-amylase and α-glucosidase, with IC 50 values of 196.4 and 365.9 μg/mL, respectively.
